results.title: Can losartan and blood pressure control peri arteriovenous fistula creation ameliorate the early associated left ventricular hypertrophic response a randomised placebo controlled trial
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ were randomised after 4 weeks of adequate BP control (SBP range of 130-150 mmHg, DBP range of 80-90 mmHg) into either @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (25 mg) and placebo or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (25 mg) and @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ (50 mg) arms in a 1: 1 ratio the day prior to @<m>DISEASE_Arteriovenous_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001164 @@@AVF@@@ creation.

citations.NLM: Zentner D, Pedagogos E, Yapanis A, Karapanagiotidis S, Kinghorn A, Alexiou A, Lee G, Raspudic M, Aggarwal A. Can losartan and blood pressure control peri arteriovenous fistula creation ameliorate the early associated left ventricular hypertrophic response a randomised placebo controlled trial BMC Res Notes. 2012 May 29;5():260. PMID: 22642740
